verses.1: Tua ciangin Topa in Joshua kiangah,
verses.2: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Sawm lohpi-in ahi a, theih lohna hangin ahi zongin mi khat a that khapa a tai theih nadingin Moses tungtawnin nang tungah kong gen bukna khuapite teel in. Phula pa kiang panin note adingin tua khuate pen bukna hi ding hi.
verses.4: Hih khuapite khat peuhpeuh ah amah tai-in khuapi kongpi tumna ah ding dinga, tua khuapi upate kiangah a thu gen tel ding hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi sungah amah paipihin amah mun khat pia dinga, amaute tawh amah om khawm ding hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin phula pa in amah a delh leh, tua pa tungah mi that pa pia lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in theih lohna hangin a veengpa thatin, a beisa hun sungah ama tungah galneihna bangmah nei lo hi.
verses.6: Thukhenna thuak dingin mihonte mai ah a din mateng le tua hun laitak a siampi lianpen pa a sih hun mateng, tua khuapi sungah amah om ding hi. Tua khit ciangin mi that khapa ama khua ama inn, a hong tai khiatna khua ah paikik thei ding hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Naftali mual tung gam sunga om Galilee gam sung panin Kedesh khua, Efraim mual tung gam sungah Shekhem khua le Judah mual tung gam sungah Kiriath-arba (Hebron a cihna) khuate a tuam koih uh hi.
verses.8: Jerikho nisuahna Jordan gal khat ah Reuben minam sung panin mualzang sehnel gam a om Bezer khua, Gad minam sung panin Gilead gam sunga om Ramoth khua le Manasseh minam sung panin Bashan gam sunga om Golan khuate a seh uh hi.
verses.9: Hihte pen Israel mi khempeuh le amaute lakah a peem khualmi adingin sawm lopi-in mi khat a that khapa pen mihonte mai ah a din ma-in phula pa khut ah a sih loh nadingin a tai theih nadinga a kiseh khuapite ahi hi.
